channel.title: Andalucia on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Andalucia on Grainy Photos

item.title: Cómpeta
item.description: Twelve photos of Cómpeta and the surrounding area. Cómpeta is renowned for its traditional Andalusian architecture, narrow cobblestone streets, whitewashed houses, and stunning views.

item.title: A photo walk around Soportújar
item.description: Soportújar, often called the “Village of Witches, is a small white village in the Alpujarra region of Spain. Find out more, with thirty-seven film photos.”

item.title: A stroll above Soportújar (Dam 24)
item.description: A spectacular walk high above Soportújar with stunning views. See 15 film photos shot with a Nikon FE2 from the walk, including the impressive 30 m waterfall on the Chico River.

item.title: Wildflowers in Andalucia
item.description: Andalucia, Spain, boasts a diverse range of wildflowers and this year, the flowers have been exceptional because of the rain several weeks ago. See fifteen colour film photos of wildflowers in Andalucia…

item.title: Ronda
item.description: Find out about Ronda in Spain, known for its stunning scenery, rich history, and cultural heritage - includes fifteen film photos of the most famous landmarks.

item.title: Two Abandoned Cortijos
item.description: Twenty-three photos of two abandoned cortijos taken with a vintage Pentax Spotmatic film camera during a morning walk.

item.title: Frigiliana
item.description: Frigiliana is a picture-postcard white village in Southern Spain - see twenty-four B&W film photos taken with a Mamiya M645 film camera on Ilford FP4 film.

item.title: A Sunday stroll on the Via Verde
item.description: Ten photos taken on the Via Verde shot on Kodak Porta 160 film using a Mamiya RB67 camera during a Sunday afternoon stroll.

item.title: Genalgaucil
item.description: Genalguacil is a classic Andalusian white town with a difference - it is famous for its street art! A photo walk with 23 film photos taken with vintage cameras.

item.title: Nerja
item.description: Nerja is a picturesque coastal resort town approximately 50 kilometres east of Málaga, Spain. 16 film photos shot on Ilford FP4 with a Mamiya M645
